name: Death in the Night
description:
Death in the Night is a game in which you have to collect the souls of cats and overcome deadly traps.

Features:
  • Gloomy atmosphere
  • Deadly traps
  • Saws, a lot of saws
  • Cats (souls of cats)
  • Levers, teleports, doors
  • Complete the levels and get achievements.

History:
The main character is death collecting the souls of seals.
What happened in this world? There is no answer to this question, but you can run jump and squat in a deadly puzzle platformer game.
